statements: SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies_inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE unit_price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE unit_price > 50 AND quantity < 30 ORDER BY supply_name ASC;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, quantity, unit_price FROM medical_supplies_inventory ORDER BY supply_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM robotics_procedures ORDER BY procedure_name DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, duration_minutes FROM robotics_procedures WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE unit_price < 50 AND quantity_in_stock >= 50;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM medical_supplies GROUP BY supply_id, supply_name;
SELECT supply_name, COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM robotics_procedures GROUP BY supply_name HAVING total_procedures > 1;

SELECT supply_name, unit_price, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM medical_supplies JOIN robotics_procedures ON supply_name = procedure_name GROUP BY supply_name, unit_price ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM robotics_procedures ORDER BY procedure_id DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used FROM robotics_procedures WHERE procedure_id = 3;
SELECT supply_id, timestamp FROM inventory_management WHERE operation_type = 'add';
SELECT name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used FROM robotics_procedures WHERE LENGTH(procedure_name) > 10 ORDER BY procedure_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE operation_type = 'add' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity_changed DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT procedure_name, supplies_required FROM robotics_procedures WHERE supplies_required LIKE '%bandages%' ORDER BY procedure_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, medical_supply, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50;
SELECT SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used FROM robotics_procedures WHERE duration_hours < 3.5;
SELECT operator_name, operator_role FROM robot_operators;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used FROM robotics_procedures WHERE duration_hours > 2;
SELECT operator_name, operator_role FROM robot_operators WHERE operator_role = 'Supervisor';
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used, duration_hours FROM robotics_procedures WHERE duration_hours BETWEEN 2.5 AND 4;
SELECT DISTINCT medical_supply FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name DESC;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM robots WHERE robot_type = 'surgical';
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_required FROM procedures WHERE equipment_required IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_required FROM procedures WHERE id = 3;
SELECT r.robot_name, ri.quantity, s.supply_name FROM robots r JOIN robot_inventory ri ON r.id = ri.robot_id JOIN medical_supplies s ON ri.supply_id = s.id WHERE ri.quantity > 0;
